Pre-Game Insights: Tyrese Maxey ranks second in the NBA in steals per game (2.2) and has been averaging 26.8 points, 7.0 assists, and 3.0 steals per game since Dec. 23.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The all-time series between the 76ers and Nets favors the Sixers, 126-90, including a 113-98 Sixers' win in Philadelphia on Nov. 22.
Others: Joel Embiid is questionable due to a left foot sprain / right sinus fracture - mask, Kelly Oubre Jr. is doubtful with a left hand sprain, and other players are out due to injuries.
Saturday will mark just the 15th home game of the season for the Nets, while the Sixers will still have played the fewest home contests in the NBA (14, tied with UTA).
